713986f-a.text:
462 West 58th Street, south side between 9th and 10th.
Avenue, showing P.S. 141.
Board of Education, N.Y.C.
1920.

710443f-a.text:
Ninth Avenue, west side, from 58th to 59th Street, showing portion of Roosevelt Hospital and Church of St. Paul the Apostle (Roman
Catholic).
September 22, 1927.
P.L. Sperr,Photographer.

710442f-a.text:
Ninth Ave., west side, north from West 58th Street, and showing a station at 59th Street of the Ninth Ave. Elevated Line. On the left, between 58th and 59th Streets is the eastern boundary of Roosevelt Hospital. The church structure partially depicted is St. Paul the Apostle R.C. Church at the S.W. corner of West 60th Street and Columbus Ave. (continuation of Ninth Ave., when north of 59th Street).
December 19, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

719052f-b.text:
View 1, and 2;
Columbus Avenue between 58th and 59th Streets, west showing Roosevelt Hospital and St. Paul R. C. church.

F. L. Speer.

April 15, 1939

[written]: View 1: Neg. 4110
